ðŸ’— Defining Life Preface These series of notes are a guided setup on how to define: Your life pillars Your life dynamic Your Disciplines You do not have to go through all steps of this document, especially when things seem trivial.
ðŸ”€ Divergence to Disciplines This document serves to explore what’s important and relevant to your life in the form of Disciplines.
ðŸ”‚ Convergence to Ikigai This document serves to condense your disciplines and define your single (or very small set) of [[LDP/600 Resources/Ikigai]].
